item.title: Southwest Anaheim Stuffed Peppers
item.description: Ingredients 4 Anaheim peppers, cut in half with seeds and membrane removed 2 cups shredded chicken 1 cup corn 1 cup salsa 1 can black beans, drained and rinsed 2 tablespoons taco seasoning 6 ounces cream cheese, room temperature 1 cup cheddar cheese, shredded sour cream, for garnish Directions preheat oven to 375 degrees in a medium bowl, combine the chicken, corn, beans, salsa, taco seasoning, and cream cheese fill each pepper with the stuffing mixture and place them in a baking dish topped with shredded cheese bake for 20 minutes or until pepper is soft and cheese is melted top with sour cream
